scripts.starttestenv: PORT=3003 NODE_ENV=test JWT_SECRET=other API_ORIGIN=https://doogetha.com pm2 start dist/bin/www.js
scripts.build: tsc && cp -r package*.json .ebextensions dist && cd dist && zip -r dist.zip *
scripts.createDB: mysql -umyevride -pmyevride myevride < db/scripts/drop.sql && mysql -umyevride -pmyevride myevride < db/scripts/create.sql && mysql -umyevride -pmyevride myevride < db/scripts/populate.sql
